gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls
Class ColorControl

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.UI.ActiveJPanel
                      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.ViewControl
                          gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.ColorControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ColorControl
extends ViewControl

This is a type of ViewControl that allows the user to select colors. This control contains a button and an optional label. The button has a square located at its center which is colored with the selected color to allow the user to visualize the color. When the user presses the button, a color selector is displayed to allow the user to select a color. As he/she selects a color, the color of the button changes also. Also, whenever the color is changed, a COLOR_CHANGED message is sent to all listeners.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

ColorControl

public ColorControl(java.lang.String con_title,
                    java.awt.Color initialColor,
                    int colorModel)
Constructs this control with the initial title, color, and color selector type. The control's label will not be visible.

Parameters:
con_title - This control's title.
initialColor - The initially selected color.
colorModel - An integer code that describes which graphical elements should be placed on the color selector displayed to allow the user to select a color. This code is one of the integer fields specified in the ColorSelector class.

ColorControl

public ColorControl(java.lang.String con_title,
                    java.lang.String labelText,
                    java.awt.Color initialColor,
                    int colorModel)
Constructs this control with the initial title, label, color, and color selector type.

Parameters:
con_title - This control's title.
labelText - The label that is placed on this control next to the button.
initialColor - The initially selected color.
colorModel - An integer code that describes which graphical elements should be placed on the color selector displayed to allow the user to select a color. This code is one of the integer fields specified in the ColorSelector class.
